title: Why should pad be smaller than half of kernel size in MaxPool2
body_html:
If I run:

torch.nn.MaxPool2d(4,stride=4,padding=3)(Variable(torch.rand(1,1,20,20)))

it turns out:

RuntimeError: invalid argument 2: pad should be smaller than half of kernel size, but got padW = 3, padH = 3, kW = 4, kH = 4 at /Users/soumith/code/builder/wheel/pytorch-src/torch/lib/THNN/generic/SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.c:35

Do I have any choice to avoid it?
